name: max-ether
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores PP to full for a selected move.
short_effect: Restores PP to full for one move.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Fully restores the PP of a selected move.
flavor_text.emerald: Fully restores the PP of a selected move.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Fully restores a selected move’s PP for one POKéMON.
